Question & Options:

B. B) Principal photography occurs after pre-production.
C. C) Principal photography includes editing and special effects.
D. D) Principal photography ends just prior to post-production.
Correct Answer: A) Principal photography is the main phase of film production., B) Principal photography occurs after pre-production., D) Principal photography ends just prior to post-production.
